about_the_game:
Konnichiwa! Welcome to the most exclusive VR Japanese strip-club!
No need to take the plane to enjoy your favorite Japanese delicacies. Relax by the sake bar or in the VIP corner and enjoy the view! Experience thrills like never before in a whole new setting with a new stage, new pole room and new private rooms!

content_descriptors.notes:
VR Paradise is a virtual striptease club that offers 3 types of sexual content:

- Pole-dances on stage with topless dancers.
- Table dances with close-up topless dancers.
- Performances in a private room during which the dancers undress completely (frontal depiction of the female genitals).

detailed_description:
Konnichiwa! Welcome to the most exclusive VR Japanese strip-club!
No need to take the plane to enjoy your favorite Japanese delicacies. Relax by the sake bar or in the VIP corner and enjoy the view! Experience thrills like never before in a whole new setting with a new stage, new pole room and new private rooms!

name: VR Paradise - Tsuki Club

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7–7700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3080 / AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
